page.title: 09Flora on the Cotswold Way
page.content: The{Cotswold Way}is a footpath running from{Chipping Campden}to{Bath.}We walked part of it on the hazy afternoon of June 19th. Here is a catalogue of the flora we found: {Trees}: Oak,Ash,Copper Beech,Willow, Lime,Norwegian Spruce,Sweet Chestnut, Beech,Silver Birch,Yew,Pine,Elm,Cedar, Apple,Hazel,American Oak,Elderberry. {Flowers}: Daisy,Dog Daisy,Red Campion, White Campion,Roe Campion,Clover,Dog Rose,Honeysuckle,Bee Orchid,Buttercup, Bluebell,Celandine,Herb Robert,Vetch, Hedgewort,Bullseye,Egg and Bacon,Lily of the Valley,Dandelion,Forget-me-not, Wild Angelica,Trefoil,Pimpernell,Giant Thistle,Greater Celandine,Whitebell, Speedwell,Cowslip,Thistle,Wild Rose, Cow Parsley,Forsythia,Philadelphia, Nettle,Mushroom,Wild Strawberry, Goose Grass.
